entities.description: The last stimulant used by the respondent not directed by a doctor in the past 12 months.
Reasons for using the last stimulant including weight loss, concentration, etc.
A list of prescription stimulants including Adderall, Ritalin, etc.

relationships.description: Indicates the last stimulant used by the survey respondent not directed by a doctor in the past 12 months.
Describes that the last stimulant used falls under the category of prescription stimulants.
Specifies the reasons for using the last stimulant.
